This dashboard includes information on Penguins data

To learn more about myself, academically, and athletically, here is the link to my [website](https://vladtomutiu.github.io)!

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(plotly)
library(janitor)

penguins <- read_csv("data/penguins_lter.csv")

penguins <- penguins %>%
  clean_names()

```

## Row 1

```{r}
ggplot(penguins, aes(culmen_length_mm, island, color = species)) +
         geom_boxplot()
         
```

```{r}
ggplot(penguins, aes(flipper_length_mm, body_mass_g, color = species)) + 
  geom_point()
```

## Row 2

```{r}
penguins <- penguins %>%
  select(-comments)

knitr::kable(penguins)
```
